ja501:16.1: Kathaṃ tvaṃ pamokkho → kathaṃ pamokkho (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kathaṃ te pamokkho (?)
ja501:22.3: Abajjhi taṃ → abajjhi tañca (bj, pts-vp-pli1); abajjhi ta (sya2ed)
ja501:27.4: umāpupphasarinnibhaṃ → ummāpupphasirinibhaṃ (bj); ummāpupphasirinnibhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja501:29.1: Kasivāṇijjā → kasī vaṇijjā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kasivaṇijjā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
